Posts.Content: If you could get the correct treatment I am sure that she will survive. Never give hope. Always give some sort of positive energy to the patient as well as the people who are caring the patient. I know a person who is still living happily after being discharged off from hospital saying that there is no hope on his life. They said a period of 6 months, and now it's been 2 years he lives happily and healthy. He was undergone an ayurvedic treatment.
Posts.Title: how long does a person survive once cancer has spread into different parts of the body
